availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Andrew J. Kinsolving (Caldwell County, Kentucky, student and resident)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, student and resident. Virginia native. Son of J. B. Kinsolving and Mary J. Kinsolving. Student in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned three enslaved persons in Caldwell County in 1850. Resident in Caldwell County in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 1, p. 324A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 1, p. 885.
"Andrew Jackson Kinsolving (1836-1911)," Find A Grave, Memorial #49053590, accessed May 17, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/49053590.
KYR-0001-020-0017.
